data.description_html:
This spell functions like the true seeing spell (see page 296 of the Player's Handbook), except that it affects multiple creatures.

Material Component: An ointment for the eyes that costs 1,000 gp and is made form mushroom powder, saffron, and fat.
data.name: True Seeing, Mass
data.target: One creature/level, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart
